name: part_006
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア4周年記念LIVE】平成初期アニソン祭り【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [7lJ5kdZGFgk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare continues her performance of 'Successful Mission'.
Scene transition to a virtual cherry blossom park at night.
Shiranui Flare and guest IRyS perform a duet of the song 'Dearest'.

subtitles.original: 僕の心で
subtitles.english: In my heart

subtitles.original: もう目覚めはじめている
subtitles.english: it's already beginning to wake up

subtitles.original: Dearest
subtitles.english: Dearest

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：浜田聖子 編曲：西田マサラ
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Shoko Hamada, Arrangement: Masara Nishida

subtitles.original: 梅雨明け前の
subtitles.english: Before the end of the rainy season

subtitles.original: 青空は
subtitles.english: the blue sky

subtitles.original: 一足早く心を躍らせる
subtitles.english: makes my heart leap a little early

subtitles.original: 今年ももうすぐ
subtitles.english: This year, too, soon...

subtitles.original: 夏が来る
subtitles.english: summer will come

subtitles.original: 街も人も浮かれ気分で騒めきだす
subtitles.english: The town and its people start buzzing in a festive mood

subtitles.original: 私はと言えば
subtitles.english: As for me...

subtitles.original: あなたを想い
subtitles.english: ...thinking of you

subtitles.original: この街で新しい風に吹かれて
subtitles.english: caught in a new breeze in this town

subtitles.original: 少しの不安も抱きしめながら
subtitles.english: While embracing even a little bit of anxiety

subtitles.original: 叶えたい明日だけを見つめて生きる
subtitles.english: I live looking only at the tomorrow I want to fulfill

subtitles.original: 少年の心のまま大人になった人
subtitles.english: You, who became an adult with a boy's heart

subtitles.original: 二人出会ったあの日に戻れないけど
subtitles.english: We can't go back to the day we met

subtitles.original: 瞳を閉じれば微笑む顔が見える
subtitles.english: If I close my eyes, I can see your smiling face

subtitles.original: 大好きなあの歌今も歌ってますか
subtitles.english: Are you still singing that song I love?

subtitles.original: 私には聴こえる
subtitles.english: I can hear it

subtitles.original: 優しい声とメロディ
subtitles.english: the gentle voice and melody

subtitles.original: 弱気なときほど
subtitles.english: Especially when I'm feeling low

subtitles.original: あなたを思い出す
subtitles.english: I remember you

subtitles.original: 時々自分が嫌いになるのは
subtitles.english: The times I occasionally end up hating myself...

subtitles.original: 軽はずみな言葉で誰かを傷つけ
subtitles.english: ...are when I hurt someone with thoughtless words

subtitles.original: その癖弱くてちっぽけだから
subtitles.english: And yet, because I'm weak and small

subtitles.original: 逃げようとする私を叱ってください
subtitles.english: Please scold me for trying to run away

subtitles.original: 二人で歌ったメロディ口ずさんでみれば
subtitles.english: If I try humming the melody we sang together

subtitles.original: 涙が一筋流れて会いたくなった
subtitles.english: A single tear falls and I miss you

subtitles.original: 受話器越しに聴いた
subtitles.english: I heard it through the receiver

subtitles.original: 弾いて聴かせてくれた
subtitles.english: You played it for me

subtitles.original: リフレインするリズム
subtitles.english: The refrain of the rhythm

subtitles.original: 胸に切なく響く
subtitles.english: echoes painfully in my chest

subtitles.original: 巡り逢えた奇跡...
subtitles.english: The miracle of us meeting...
